mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.prop_key AS "propKey", a.prop_value AS "propValue", a.prop_desc AS "propDesc", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.status AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_default_prop( id, prop_key, prop_value, prop_desc, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{propKey}, #{propValue}, #{propDesc}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_default_prop SET prop_key = #{propKey}, prop_value = #{propValue}, prop_desc = #{propDesc}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
